paragraphs.context: the ipfilter utility could allow a local attacker to launch a symlink attack . the ipfilter utility improper handles temporary files in the /tmp directory . a local attacker can create a symbolic link in the /tmp directory to corrupt arbitrary files on the system once a privileged user invokes the ipfilter command .
